page.title: 11Modern Bayston Hill.
page.content: This dormitory of Shrewsbury has been expanded largely in the last 20 years. In our D block on the busy A49 there are 2{garages,}a{petrol station}and 3 {pubs}.Further in by the main cross roads there is a{butcher's shop,estate {agent's,delicatessen,video shop,news {agent's}and{police station}(See p.15). In Glebe Road there is a C.of E. {church}(See p.18).It was built of wood with a girder frame in 1983.Oakland, our{primary school,}is next to the church and has 130 pupils, with 15 adult staff.There is a{vet}in Lythwood Road,and a{library.} It is named Mary Webb after a famous local authoress.It has a new way of issuing library tickets.The librarian has a light pen which checks books for the computer.It is linked (with the Shrewsbury library) to the Salop C.C's Shirehall computer.
